Initialization.NonQueryStatement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS UserScores ( UserID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, Belief double NOT NULL, Version int(11) NULL, NumOfFacts int(11) NOT NULL ) ENGINE = MEMORY

INSERT INTO UserScores (UserId, Belief, Version, NumOfFacts) (SELECT u.UserID as UserId, 0 as Belief, 1 as Version, 0 as NumOfFacts FROM users_v u WHERE u.UserID NOT IN (SELECT us.UserId FROM UserScores us))
UPDATE UserScores us, (SELECT im.UserID, COUNT(*) as NumOfItems FROM ItemsMentions_v im GROUP BY im.UserID) s SET us.NumOfFacts = s.NumOfItems WHERE s.UserID=us.UserID

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS UserGraph ( ID INT(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, SourceUserID INT(11) unsigned NOT NULL, TargetUserID INT(11) unsigned NOT NULL, Weight DOUBLE NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
PRIMARY KEY(ID), FOREIGN KEY SourceUserID_fkey (SourceUserID) REFERENCES Users (id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY TargetUserID_fkey (TargetUserID) REFERENCES Users (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE = MEMORY

INSERT INTO UserGraph (SourceUserID, TargetUserID, Weight) SELECT im1.UserId, im2.UserId, COUNT(*) AS Weight FROM ItemsMentions_v im1, ItemsMentions_v im2 WHERE im1.UserId <> im2.UserId AND im1.ItemId=im2.ItemId GROUP BY im1.UserId, im2.UserId

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CurrentState ( ID INT(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, CurUserID INT(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY(ID), FOREIGN KEY CurUserID_fkey (CurUserID) REFERENCES Users (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE = MEMORY
INSERT INTO CurrentState (CurUserId) (SELECT UserID FROM users_v ORDER BY UserID)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RepKeyResults (ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, TargetUserID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL) ENGINE = MEMORY

Body.NonQueryStatement: UPDATE UserScores us SET us.Belief = us.Belief + (select count(*) from CurrentState cs where cs.CurUserId=us.UserId)

Body.NonQueryStatement: UPDATE CurrentState cs, RepKeyResults rk SET cs.CurUserId = rk.TargetUserId WHERE cs.ID = rk.ID
